pages.title: Beacon Beams
pages.text: Sometimes you want to set up a beacon, but the beams just don't fit into the aesthetic of your build. In this pack, you can place a glass block above a beacon to disable the beam. What's more, you can place additional glass blocks to toggle rendering of the beam!

pages.title: Beacon Range
pages.text: The better the material used to make the beacon the farther the range of the beacon!
